name: Treasure Finding
description:
Description:

Find treasures using treasure map! oh snap x mark is missing?! but maybe there is a way to find and dig the chest anyway??

In this game you have to find and dig out buried chest using treasure map with clues. Clues and treasure spot are randomly generated! New map every game (you will have to restart game via executable (sorry) ).

Made for Godot Wild Jam 31: https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-31
Controls:

Movement - WASD
Dig with shovel - Left Mouse Button
Look at Map - R
Open menu - Escape

Assets used:

Impact by Iwan 'qubodup' Gabovitch http://opengameart.org/users/qubodup

"42 snow and gravel footsteps" by Corsica_S
https://opengameart.org/content/42-snow-and-gravel-footsteps

"Dungeon Crawl 32x32 tiles" by Chris Hamons & MedicineStorm
https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles
